NFT Mood Collection
A dynamic NFT collection that reflects the owner's mood, built with Solidity and Foundry.

Overview
This project implements a dynamic NFT collection where each NFT can change its appearance based on the owner's mood. The NFTs can switch between "Happy" and "Sad" states, with the visual representation changing accordingly.

Key features:

100% on-chain NFT with SVG images stored directly in the contract
Dynamic state changes allowing NFT owners to flip their mood
Base64 encoding for efficient storage and rendering
Built with Foundry for robust testing and deployment
Technical Details
Smart Contracts
MoodNft.sol: The main NFT contract that implements the ERC721 standard with dynamic metadata
Includes functions to mint new NFTs and flip their mood state
On-Chain Storage
This project uses two approaches for storing NFT images:

SVG Images: The NFT visuals are stored directly on-chain as SVG code
Base64 Encoding: SVG images are encoded in Base64 to be embedded in the token URI
Token URI Structure
The token URI is dynamically generated and contains:

NFT name
Description
Attributes (including moodiness trait)
The embedded SVG image based on the current mood
SVG Images
The project includes two SVG images representing different moods:

Base64 Encoded Image URIs
The SVG images are encoded in Base64 to be embedded directly in the token URI:

Happy SVG URI
data:image/svg+xml;base64,



Sad SVG URI
data:image/svg+xml;base64,



Usage
Prerequisites
Foundry
Git
Installation
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/sahilsan95/NFT-COLLECTION.git
cd NFT-COLLECTION

# Install dependencies
forge install



Build
forge build



Test
forge test



Deployment
To deploy to a local Anvil instance:

# Start Anvil in a separate terminal
anvil

# Deploy the contract
forge script script/DeployMoodNft.s.sol:DeployMoodNft --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --broadcast



To deploy to a testnet (e.g., Sepolia):

forge script script/DeployMoodNft.s.sol:DeployMoodNft --rpc-url <YOUR_RPC_URL> --private-key <YOUR_PRIVATE_KEY> --broadcast --verify
